name: Puran Poli
description: Sweet stuffed flatbread made with chana dal and jaggery.
instructions: Pressure cook chana dal for 2 whistles.
Cook mashed dal with jaggery until thick.
Add cardamom powder and let cool.
Prepare soft dough with wheat flour and water.
Stuff sweet mixture inside dough ball.
Roll gently and cook on tawa with ghee.
